content:
3, 2016
												I wanted to get this game to give it a quick review seeing as no one else (in my language) has.Alright, God Simulator everyone.Its exactly how it looks and sounds from the video.  you select 3 out of 4 options of what you want your world to be made out of. Trees, mountains, lakes, and rocks.  Once thats done you choose... animals and events? to happen. Theres also a SCORE counter at the bottem left.  The tutorial of the game tells you basic camra controls and nothing of the game itself. When you start a game your told what to do, but even that is extreamly vague.  The FONT for the 'events' sandstorm (not dust storm as it says in its desc) rain, big rain, and fog and something else, is Horrible. The UI is garbage.One little thing that upset me is the game is based around humans, fair enough, but when Humans are summoned a 'food and happiness' shows up on the top upper left. The happiness is represented by =) face, while hunger is represented by a crudely drawn image of Pizza.    Yep.

												Game I assume is very early in development;1. No Save Option2. Game has no overall objective3. Using weather buttons really has no affect overall but getting you free points4. Quite limited world size5. Animal and people dont do anything but move around6. The 'General Improvements' end at 5 and thats where the game sort of ends7. Eventually game turns to nothign except for spaming the wather buttonsI hope to see future updates has the game has a good concept but im leaving a thumbs down as no where does the game say that this is early acess or early release.Also would like to add howcome the picture of this game on the store page has very further development is this not released to us?

number of helpful: 7 of 10 people (70%) found this review helpful1 person found this review funny
content:
3, 2016
												Theres not much to say about this game.Its a small, unfinished-looking, wierd game. If the creator put a little more effort into creating a game, this actually could become something.I'm sure I speak for everyone when I say: NO MUSIC. At least let us have a way to turn it off.Make the fonts you use consistent. Don't use 5 different fonts for just 3 menus, make them all the same font.Some of the scrolling speed is ABYSMALLY slow.Try and use some better English in the descriptions and such.Developer, if you really want to make a well designed, fully functional God Simulator, then don't use Unity.And the worst thing is: Theres nothing to do. After creating man, theres not much to do beyond managing them.Put in a bit of effort, and some dedication, and this could be an OK game. but as it stands, I would not reccomend this game to others. Sorry.3/10

Product received for free
												My friend purchased this for me about 10 minutes ago. I managed to click a box to make the earth then a box for trees, another box for a lake and another for rocks I believe.I watched as my little people slide back and forth upon the tile, I mocked them by clicking "Make a big Rain" until I had enough points to spawn various animals who also slid along the tile aimlessly lost in my world, after 4 minutes of accumulating points and not being able to do anything more with my humans, various animals or buildings I became a vengeful god, and forced a drought, which seemed to make them happy.I then proceeded to close the game, understanding creationism better then before this purchase.10/10
